'''Hetu''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

An employee of the RDC working for [Iverra](/iverra/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * You can pickpocket [Hetu's Key](/hetusKey/) from him with [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 1, which can be used to open a nearby chest.
}}
